channel.title: How to make hit system rep++
channel.description:
I were wondring how to make a max hit system / hit system like dds can hit up to 480-390 max i know it has something to do with the CombatAssistant file but im not really sure what to edit / add. If you could help it would be nice :) with hit system i mean to make hits highter and more change to hit.
base: ( project insanity )
thanks :)

item.title: How to make hit system rep++
item.dc:creator: @Chaotic-Madness Chaotic-Madness
item.description:
@Chaotic-Madness wrote:

RiiPiiNFtW:

change the c.specAccuracy = 10.0; to something lower i believe.

Well i think it worked, but however how can i make example: chaotic weapons hit more?

without changing the str bonus.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make hit system rep++
